headline: Is It Time To Reevaluate First Solar (FSLR) After Its Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: Many investors are wondering whether First Solar is still fairly priced after its strong run, and whether the current share price offers a margin of safety or leaves limited room for error. The stock last closed at US$246.26, delivering a 28.8% return over 1 year and a 132.2% return over 5 years, despite a 5.7% decline over the past 7 days and a 10.2% decline year to date. Recent attention on solar and broader clean energy companies has kept First Solar on many investors' watchlists...
